description: Lists resource snapshot jobs owned by the customer. This operation supports various filtering scenarios, including listing all jobs owned by the caller, jobs for a specific engagement, jobs with a specific status, or any combination of these filters.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Configures the sorting of the response. If omitted, results are sorted by CreatedDate in descending order. SortBy (string) --- Specifies the field by which to sort the resource snapshot jobs. SortOrder (string) --- Determines the order in which the sorted results are presented.

nested_params.name: SortBy
nested_params.description: Specifies the field by which to sort the resource snapshot jobs.

nested_params.name: SortOrder
nested_params.description: Determines the order in which the sorted results are presented.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotJobSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of resource snapshot job summary objects.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resource snapshot job.

nested_items.name: EngagementId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Engagement.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the resource snapshot job within the AWS Partner Central system. This ID is used for direct references to the job within the service.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the snapshot job.
STOPPED: The job is not currently running.
RUNNING: The job is actively executing.
